title: Abomination
description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

title: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

title: Acid Arrow
description: On Reveal: Switch sides.

title: Adam Warlock
description: After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here.

title: Aero
description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

title: Agatha Harkness
description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

title: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

title: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

title: Agent Venom
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 4.

title: Agony
description: After you play a card here, merge this with it.

title: Ajax
description: Ongoing: +1 Power for each card in play afflicted with negative Power.

title: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy cards here.

title: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.

title: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

title: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +1 Power.

title: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

title: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

title: Anti-Venom
description: On Reveal: Set the Cost and Power of your deck's top card to 0.

title: Bishop
description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

title: Black Bolt
description: On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your opponent's hand.

title: Black Cat
description: If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

title: Black Knight
description: After you discard a card, add the Ebony Blade to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)

title: Black Panther
description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

title: Black Swan
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

title: Black Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

title: Blade
description: On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.

title: Blink
description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.

title: Blob
description: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 13 or more Power.

title: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

title: Brood
description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings here with the same Power.

title: Broodling
description: "We are Brood, from Broodworld. You are lunch."

title: Bucky Barnes
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

title: Bullseye
description: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)

title: Cable
description: On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

title: Caiera
description: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

title: Cannonball
description: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

title: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other Ongoing cards here have +2 Power.

title: Captain Marvel
description: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

title: Carnage
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

title: Cassandra Nova
description: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each card in your opponent's deck.

title: Cerebro
description: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

title: Chimichanga
description: On Reveal: Merge this with one of your cards here.

title: Cloak
description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

title: Colleen Wing
description: On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your hand.

title: Colossus
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

title: Copycat
description: When you draw this, steal the text from the bottom card of your opponent's deck.

title: Corvus Glaive
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand to get +1 Max Energy.

title: Cosmo
description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.

title: Debrii
description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

title: Demon
description: "A deal is a deal."

title: Destroyer
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

title: Devil Dinosaur
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

title: Djinn
description: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +2 Energy.

title: Doctor Doom
description: On Reveal: Add a 5-Power DoomBot to each other location.

title: Doctor Octopus
description: On Reveal: Pull the lowest-Power card from your opponent's hand to their side of this location.

title: Doctor Strange
description: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

title: Domino
description: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

title: Doombot
description: "Doom is supreme!"

title: Dracula
description: At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand to gain its Power.

title: Drax
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

title: Drone
description: "zzzzzzZZZTT!"

title: Ebony Maw
description: You can't play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can't play cards here.

title: Echo
description: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.

title: Electro
description: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

title: Elektra
description: On Reveal: Destroy an enemy 1-Cost card here.

title: Elsa Bloodstone
description: Each card you play to fill your side of a location gains +2 Power.

title: Enchantress
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.

title: Evolved Abomination
description: Costs 1 less for each enemy card in play that's afflicted with negative Power.

title: Evolved Cyclops
description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, afflict 2 enemy cards here with -1 Power.

title: Evolved Hulk
description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, +2 Power. (if in hand or in play)

title: Evolved Misty Knight
description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, give one of your other cards +1 Power.

title: Evolved Shocker
description: On Reveal: Give the leftmost card in your hand -1 Cost.

title: Evolved The Thing
description: On Reveal: Afflict 3 enemy cards here with -1 Power.

title: Evolved Wasp
description: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -1 Power.

title: Falcon
description: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

title: Fenris Wolf
description: Activate: Resurrect the highest-Power discarded or destroyed enemy card to your side of this location.

title: Firestar
description: On Reveal: Each card you played last turn gains +3 Power.

title: Flatman
description: Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +1 Power.

title: Forge
description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +2 Power.

title: Frigga
description: none

title: Galactus
description: On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

title: Gambit
description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand to destroy a random enemy card.

title: Gamora
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

title: Ghost
description: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)

title: Ghost Rider
description: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

title: Ghost-Spider
description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

title: Giganto
description: You can only play this at the left location.

title: Gilgamesh
description: On Reveal: +1 Power for each of your other cards in play with increased Power.

title: Gladiator
description: On Reveal: Add a card from your opponent's deck to their side of this location. If it has less Power, destroy it.

title: Goblin Queen
description: On Reveal: Other cards can't be revealed this turn.

title: Goose
description: Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 here.

title: Gorr
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for EACH On Reveal card in play.

title: Grand Master
description: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

title: Grapple Arrow
description: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it to this location.

title: Green Goblin
description: On Reveal: Switch sides.

title: Groot
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

title: Gwenpool
description: On Reveal: Pick a random card in your hand 3 times. Give +2 Power each time.

title: Havok
description: After each turn, you lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +4 Power.

title: Hawkeye
description: On Reveal: If you play a card at this location next turn, +3 Power.

title: Hazmat
description: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

title: Heimdall
description: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

title: Hela
description: On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -2 Power.

title: Helicarrier
description: When you discard this, fill your hand with random cards.

title: Hellcow
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

title: Hercules
description: The first time another card moves here each turn, move it to another location.

title: High Evolutionary
description: At the start of the game, unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.

title: Hit Monkey
description: On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.

title: Hobgoblin
description: On Reveal: Switch sides.

title: Hope Summers
description: After you play a card here, you get +1 Energy next turn.

title: Howard the Duck
description: Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.

title: Hulk
description: "HULK SMASH!"

title: Hulkbuster
description: On Reveal: Merge this with one of your cards here.

title: Hulkling
description: At the start of the game, copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

title: Human Torch
description: When this moves, double its Power.

title: Hydra Bob
description: After each turn, this moves if a player Snapped.

title: Iceman
description: On Reveal: Give a card in your opponent's hand +1 Cost. (maximum 6)

title: Illusion!
description: This is a fake Mysterio!

title: Invisible Woman
description: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

title: Iron Fist
description: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.

title: Iron Lad
description: On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.

title: Iron Man
description: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled here.

title: Ironheart
description: On Reveal: Give 3 of your other cards +2 Power.

title: J. Jonah Jameson
description: Ongoing: Your emotes are ruder.

title: Jane Foster Mighty Thor
description: On Reveal: Draw all cards that cost 0 from your deck.

title: Jean Grey
description: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)

title: Jeff the Baby Land Shark
description: You can move this once. Nothing can stop you from moving or playing this to any location.

title: Witchfire
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

title: Wolfsbane
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

title: Wolverine
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

title: Wong
description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

title: X-23
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

title: Yellowjacket
description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -1 Power.

title: Yo-Yo
description: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

title: Yondu
description: On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent's deck.

title: Zabu
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less.

title: Zero
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
